external_games.name: Bracken Tor: The Time of Tooth and Claw
Bracken Tor: The Time of Tooth and Claw

name: Bracken Tor: The Time of Tooth and Claw
summary: The second point and click horror/adventure game from developer Shadow Tor Studios. Spend a night in the moorlands as you investigate sightings of unexplainable creatures reported by park rangers and hikers in the area.
